name: @litejs/cli
description: Command line tools for LiteJS full-stack framework
author: Lauri Rooden <lauri@rooden.ee>

scripts.test: TZ='Europe/Tallinn' node --allow-natives-syntax --expose-gc ./index.js test test/index.js --coverage --sources='*.js,cli/*.js' --brief --no-status && jshint --config=.github/jshint.json *.js cli/*.js
